text: Ayesha Curry was mercilessly trolled after posting a message on Twitter following the Golden State Warrior's loss on Sunday night. She's become known for her controversial tweets, but after the Cleveland Cavaliers claimed a 93 - 89 victory, Steph Curry's wife was surprisingly contrite. In a message posted shortly after Game 7 of the NBA Finals ended, she wrote that she was'proud'of the players and described the season as'insane.'But despite remaining neutral, the 27 - year - old mother - of - two was mocked relentlessly by basketball fans. Some took the opportunity to replace Steph in a Curry family photo with LeBron James while others unsurprisingly got creative with the infamous crying Michael Jordan meme.
